type.name: org.gradle.tooling.BuildAction
type.description:
An action that executes against a Gradle build and produces a result of type T.

You can execute a BuildAction using the ProjectConnection#action(BuildAction) method.


param: The type of result produced by this action. @since 1.8

method.name: execute
method.description:
Executes this action and returns the result.
param:controller The controller to use to access and control the build.

returns:The result @since 1.8
